title: ‘You Don’t Look Anorexic’
description: New research shows that our assumptions about eating disorders are often wrong — and that many larger-bodied people are starving themselves.
dc:creator: Kate Siber
media:credit: Ryan Pfluger for The New York Times
media:description: Sharon Maxwell is recovering from atypical anorexia. She suffered from disordered eating for 19 years before receiving a diagnosis.
